name: Dog Ownership Simulator
description:
Play with your dog!

Click and drag to give it a spin, swipe on poos to clean them up! Dog falls asleep between 10pm and 8am :)

Made in a week for Game a Week 2019!

(If you wanna have your dog hang out with you while you do other stuff on your computer, set the resolution to the lowest + check windowed mode in the launcher!)
